title: What are the best universities for a master’s in the UK? - Quora
tags: Colleges and Universities in the United Kingdom

response.answer_text: That will depend on your subject of study if you hope to use that Master's qualification to get into a related industry. So for Computing/ IT the best universities for a Master's are University of Oxford, Imperial College London and University of Edinburgh. In contrast if you want to study a niche subject such as Hotel Management University of Surrey is the best university for that. King's College London is the best for Nursing. University of Nottingham, King's College London and University College London the best for Pharmacy. University of East Anglia runs the best Creative Writing Master's. The Royal College of Art, University of London runs the best Fine Art Master's. If you check the QS Subject tables there you will get an idea which UK universities is best for what subjects.
